about_the_game:
This software is an Official Maker Series DLC, offering you an extensive selection of icons for use in your Maker Projects. This collection comprises 1128 icons representing weapons, armor, accessories, and items for your characters to employ during their journey through your world.

■ An icon sheet containing 1128 icons
■ A bonus window skin

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

【Iconset (1 sheet)】
- An iconset featuring 1128 icons, representing various objects such as weapons, armor, accessories, and items, providing you with a wide array of options to choose from.

【Window skin (1 sheet)】
- A bonus window skin is included, featuring a blue design that captures the essence of early-era RPGs.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
